Title: Evil
Writer: Jan Guillou (novel), Hans Gunnarsson, Mikael Håfström
Actors: Andreas Wilson, Henrik Lundström, Gustaf Skarsgård, Linda Zilliacus
Plot: A teenage boy expelled from school for fighting arrives at a boarding school where the systematic bullying of younger students is encouraged as a means to maintain discipline, and decides to fight back.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 9 wins & 9 nominations.
